reviewText: This was a mistake.  I thought I was getting the prequel to All Creatures Great and Small.

Item was advertised as having connection with the BBC TV program James Herriott and "All Creatures Great and Small".  It is only a DVD of music and scenes that are taken outdoors.  This mislead me to think the ad was correct so I bought it for a gift and now I can not get a response to return this item.  Do not purchase this item.  Betty Jean King
